snippet: Sony and BMG, onetime partners, are said to be teaming up again on a bid to buy - and then divide between themselves - some of the EMI recorded music assets being sold by the Universal Music Group.
abstract: Sony and BMG, onetime partners, are said to be teaming up again on a bid to buy - and then divide between themselves - some of the EMI recorded music assets being sold by the Universal Music Group.

headline.main: Sony and BMG Are Said to Team Up on Bid for EMI
headline.print_headline: EMI Bid Is Said to Draw Sony and BMG
